title: The Blur Recipe
full_text:
The Blur Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
2 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
Green Chartreuse
1 1/2
ounces
Maraska Maraschino liqueur
1 1/2
ounces
freshly squeezed lime juice
, from
1 to 2
whole
limes
Cava
or other
dry sparkling wine
Directions
Add Chartreuse, maraschino, and lime to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into two Champagne flutes, dividing evenly. Top each flute with Cava and serve.
Special equipment
cocktail shaker and strainer
